name: payroo
description: Payroo Mini Payrun System - Full-stack TypeScript application

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:api && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.setup: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd api && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:web

author: Payroo Team
